resources.string:
"Update failed.
Your device will recover to the original configuration."
"System requires at least %1$d%% battery life to proceed with the system update process. Please charge the battery before the system update."
"This update improves the stability and would not clear any of your data, we strongly suggest you upgrade to this version. Press Yes to accept the update."
Press No to discard the update.
We recommend using a free Wi-Fi hotspot to download the update.
If you press Later, you can proceed with the download anytime by pressing the notification.
Download aborted by server, please try again later.
Checking the integrity of your firmware file.
Upgrade error, please download update package again.
Start to download critical update package.
Network is initializing DM Session, accept?
"Insufficient space, please uninstall some applications and retry."
There is no update available for your device currently.
New system firmware update available, press to upgrade.
New system firmware update available, press to download.
Would you like to download the following system firmware update?
"A new system firmware update for your device has been downloaded. Install now? "
There is a system firmware update for your device. Please check notifications.
This system firmware update improves the stability and would not clear any of your data, we strongly suggest you upgrade to this version.
